amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit Export-Import Bank authorizations to countervailing purposes in order to meet competition from foreign export credit agencies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A074) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 309 (Roll no. 608).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Mulvaney amendment (A074) Failed by recorded vote: 117 - 309 (Roll no. 608).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A074) offered by Mr. Mulvaney.
